ModMetaData.name: DocWorld
ModMetaData.author: Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
One of the most ambitious efforts to reorganize RimWorld/Mods into a cleaner, better functioning, and intuitive system. This mod patches, fixes, and adds content to many mods (including but not limited to plain old vanilla RimWorld).
<size=24>Features</size> * New Architect tabs and organizes Architect menu * New drop down menus * Balances recipes for various items * Underground power conduits * Enhances miniaturisation abilities * Increased "stuffable" items * Lights are now more efficient with power usage * Greatly improves inter-mod compatibility
[Link to Full Feature List] https://github.com/DrZhivago1/DocWorld/wiki/1.-Content-Overview
[Link to GitHub] https://github.com/DrZhivago1/DocWorld/releases
[Link to Ludeon] https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=47165.msg447416#msg447416
[The Doctor's World mod collection] https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1568763074
